attributes.action: Assisted Dying - 'Thin End of the Wedge'
attributes.additional_details:
We are kept alive longer by new medication and life prolonging operations - but can the NHS afford us to live too long - I think not as proved by many articles in the national press and THE LIVERPOOL CARE PATHWAY (dying in the elderly and terminally ill).
The truth is out - they now want to assist us to die!!!
If the UK can no longer afford to support older people during the latter stages of their lives, maybe, just maybe Assisted Dying is the answer - VOTE NO TO THIS PLAN IT IS THE FIRST PHASE OF SPENDING LESS ON THE ELDERLY - and remember we will all be old one day
